meanings.definition: Relating to or denoting the earliest epoch of the Tertiary period, between the Eocene and Miocene epochs.
meanings.sent1: The pleiocene rocks hold ancient secrets of the past.
meanings.sent2: Scientists study the pleiocene era to understand Earth's history.
meanings.sent3: The pleiocene fossils decided to throw a party to celebrate their age.
meanings.sent4: The pleiocene landscape whispered tales of forgotten times.
meanings.sent5: The pleiocene artifacts gleamed under the museum lights.

meanings.definition: A subdivision of the Tertiary period, comprising the Miocene and Pliocene epochs.
meanings.sent1: The pleiocene marks a significant period in geological history.
meanings.sent2: Many fossils from the pleiocene are found in this region.
meanings.sent3: The pleiocene seemed to have a never-ending collection of rocks.
meanings.sent4: In the vast museum of time, the pleiocene stood out like a rare gem.
meanings.sent5: Exploring the pleiocene feels like diving into a time capsule.
